about.me: gradebooklet get's maintained and developed by
about.text: First off, thank you for downloading gradebooklet. gradebooklet helps you organize your grades in a more intuitive and easier way. If you don't think so, request a feature or report a bug.
about.title: About gradebooklet

module.name: Subject Name

exam.grade-doesnt-match-example: Grade does not match the example.
exam.max-points-range-error: Maximum score should be between 0.0 and 999.9.
exam.reached-points-range-error: Achieved score should be between 0 and maximum score.

module.gradesystem-selection-change-error: Existing exams are deleted when the gradesystem is changed.

subjects.entry-header: Pretty empty here. Create a new subject.
subjects.title: Subjects

popup.exam_warning: Grade doesn't match example. It should look like 5.5 or 5
popup.exams_without_names: Cannot save. Some Exams are missing names.
popup.not_saved_warning: You will lose your Progress if you continue.
popup.exams-pdf-warning: Add module to create a PDF of the modules.
popup.module-no-name: Module does not contain a name
popup.warning-grades-deletion: If you do so, all exams will be deleted

settings.darkmode-info: Overwrites the system theme to dark mode.
settings.extended-security-info: This option makes use of extended security measures on this device e.g., a finger- or face scanner.
settings.title: Settings

first.text: Do you know that you just made the best decision of your life to manage your grades? Let me show you...
first.title: Welcome

second.text: gradebooklet is the most versatile gradebook you've ever seen. The focus was to make it simple for you to organize your grades in an easier and better way.
second.title: What is gradebooklet?

third.text: The Creator of gradebooklet is still a Student, therefore he knows what you'll really need to keep track your grades.
third.title: Easy to use

account.reset-password-link-sent: If this email exists, a password reset link has been sent.
account.successfully-signed-out-info: Your session has been terminated. See you soon!

register.title: Register
register.password-info: * min. 8 chars, upper- and lowercase letters as well as numbers.
register.info-text: Welcome! Your account is being created...

verify-email.continue: Please verify your email to continue...
verify-email.takes-longer: It takes a little longer. Please update manually.
